original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1226)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(916)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並造成每秒 <color=#ccffcc>-55</color> 點傷害的永久燃燒，同時自身也會一起燃燒且受到少量傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1226)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(916)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in the front area, and causes permanent burning of <color=#ccffcc>-55</color> damage per second, and at the same time, it burns together and receives a small amount of damage hurt.
